Package camzup.core

Class Mesh3

  • java.lang.Object
    • camzup.core.EntityData
      • camzup.core.Mesh
        • camzup.core.Mesh3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntityData, IUtils
    public class Mesh3
extends Mesh
    Organizes data needed to draw a three dimensional shape using vertices and faces.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Mesh3.Face3
      Packages 3D mesh vertices into an object.
      static class  Mesh3.Vert3
      Packages 3D mesh coordinates, texture coordinates and normals into a single object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Vec3[] coords
      An array of coordinates in the mesh.

      The faces array does not include information about the faces themselves, but rather indices to other arrays which contain vertex data.
      int materialIndex
      The material associated with this mesh in a mesh entity.
      Vec3[] normals
      An array of normals to indicate how light will bounce off the mesh's surface.
      Vec2[] texCoords
      The texture (UV) coordinates that describe how an image is mapped onto the geometry of the mesh.

    • Field Detail

      • coords

        public Vec3[] coords
        An array of coordinates in the mesh.

      • faces

        public int[][][] faces
        The faces array does not include information about the faces themselves, but rather indices to other arrays which contain vertex data. It is a three-dimensional array organized by
        1. the number of faces;
        2. the number of vetices per faces;
        3. the information per face;
        2D meshes contain two pieces of information per vertex: spatial coordinates and texture coordinates.

      • materialIndex

        public int materialIndex
        The material associated with this mesh in a mesh entity.

      • normals

        public Vec3[] normals
        An array of normals to indicate how light will bounce off the mesh's surface.

      • texCoords

        public Vec2[] texCoords
        The texture (UV) coordinates that describe how an image is mapped onto the geometry of the mesh. Typically in the range [0.0, 1.0].

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mesh3

        public Mesh3()
        The default constructor.

      • Mesh3

        public Mesh3​(int[][][] faces,
             Vec3[] coords,
             Vec2[] texCoords,
             Vec3[] normals)
        Creates a mesh from arrays of faces, coordinates, texture coordinates and normals. The mesh's arrays are set by reference, not by value.
        Parameters:
        faces - the faces array
        coords - the coordinates array
        texCoords - the texture coordinates array
        normals - the normals array

      • Mesh3

        public Mesh3​(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a named mesh.
        Parameters:
        name - the mesh name

      • Mesh3

        public Mesh3​(java.lang.String name,
             int[][][] faces,
             Vec3[] coords,
             Vec2[] texCoords,
             Vec3[] normals)
        Creates a named mesh from arrays of faces, coordinates, texture coordinates and normals. The mesh's arrays are set by reference, not by value.
        Parameters:
        name - the mesh name
        faces - the faces array
        coords - the coordinates array
        texCoords - the texture coordinates array
        normals - the normals array
